entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
